title: Ein Tag im Café
translation: Anna gets hungry and goes to a café. She uses the menu and orders a beer and a bread roll. The waiter brings the order soon. Anna pays the beer in cash. Next to the café stands a tree. She sits on the bench and reads an example in the book. Both friends meet in the café. They shake hands and are acquainted with each other. Martin helps Anna fill out a form. 'That means,' she says, 'you must enter your name here.' After the meeting, Anna starts working again. In the waiting room, the baby waits and sings a song. Anna is happy and thinks about a nice trip on the weekend.
